project.name: niem-release
project.description:
NIEM 4.0 in Java
The National Information Exchange Model (NIEM) is a community-driven, common vocabulary that enables efficient information exchange across diverse public and private organizations. NIEM can save time and money by providing consistent, reusable data terms and definitions and repeatable processes.
NIEM is distributed as a set of XML stylesheets (XSD) files.
Versioning
This is a compilation of the complete NIEM 4.0 release. The major and minor version of this library will always be "4.0". The patch version will be incremented as appropriate.
History
v4.0.0 - compile 02/01/18
